flawed_nl_solution:
The next roll will be his 11th roll.
The total on this tenth roll to have an average of 3 is 33, because 3 * 11 = <<3*11=33>>33
His current total is 13 because 1 + 3 + 2 + 4 + 3 + 5 + 6 + 1 + 4 + 2= <<1+3+2+4+3+5+6+1+4+2=13>>13
He needs to roll a 20 because 33 - 13 = <<33-13=20>>20
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 31, not 13. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
